summary.para: Creates a rendering parameters object with the specified properties.

param.name: gamma
param.para: The gamma level to be set for the new rendering parameters object.

param.name: enhancedContrast
param.para: The enhanced contrast level to be set for the new rendering parameters object.

param.name: enhancedContrastGrayscale
param.para: The amount of contrast enhancement to use for grayscale antialiasing, zero or greater.

param.name: clearTypeLevel
param.para: The ClearType level to be set for the new rendering parameters object.

param.name: pixelGeometry
param.para: Represents the internal structure of a device pixel (that is, the physical arrangement of red, green, and blue color components) that is assumed for purposes of rendering text.

param.name: renderingMode
param.para: A value that represents the method (for example, ClearType natural quality) for rendering glyphs.

param.name: renderingParams
param.para: When this method returns, contains an address of a pointer to the newly created rendering parameters object.

summary.para: Gets a font collection representing the set of EUDC (end-user defined characters) fonts.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Note that if no EUDC is set on the system, the returned collection will be empty, meaning it will return success but GetFontFamilyCount will be zero.

summary.para: The root factory interface for all DirectWrite objects.
